1. City Council

City Council
============

* Second and Fourth (as needed) Tuesday of each month
* City Council Room at City Hall
  960 Early Blvd.
  Early, TX 76802

View details on how to
[place an item on the agenda and come before the City Council and speak](https://www.earlytx.net/FAQ.aspx?TID=15 "place an item on the agenda and come before the City Council and speak")
.

Agendas are available at least 72-hours prior to the date of the scheduled meetings. A copy of the agenda is also posted under public notices and on the front door of City Hall.

### About the City's Governmental Body

The City of Early governmental body is made up of the Mayor and five City Council members and the Office of the City Manager. Together these two bodies are responsible for the formulation and communication of public policy to meet community needs, assure orderly development in the city and provide for the general administration of the city.
Council meetings are scheduled on the second and fourth Tuesdays of each month. The Council is required to meet at least one time each month, the second meeting on the fourth Tuesday is scheduled on an as needed basis.

The mission of the City of Early's governmental body is to set policy and give overall leadership to the organization.
